fixes.name: Maturity Normalized
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR mat = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MATURITY]
VAR secMat = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[SECURITY_MATURITY]
VAR endDate = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[END_DATE]
VAR settle = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[SETTLE_DATE]
RETURN
IF(YEAR(mat) <> 1980,
    mat,
    IF(YEAR(secMat) <> 1980,
       secMat,
       IF(YEAR(endDate) <> 1980,
          endDate,
          IF(YEAR(settle) <> 1980,
             settle,
             mat
          )
       )
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau nested IF logic to a DAX calculated column. Created VARs for each referenced date field from 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)' and applied YEAR(...) <> 1980 checks in the same order as the Tableau expression, returning the first matching date or MATURITY as the fallback.
